statements: SELECT * FROM theater_reservations;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, show_id, seat_number, reservation_date FROM theater_reservations;
SELECT customer_id, show_id, seat_number FROM theater_reservations WHERE reservation_date > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT show_id, customer_id, seat_number FROM theater_reservations ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, show_id, seat_number FROM theater_reservations WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM theater_reservations WHERE reservation_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, seat_number FROM theater_reservations WHERE show_id = 3 ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_id, show_id, reservation_date FROM theater_reservations WHERE customer_id = 5 AND seat_number > 10;
SELECT * FROM theater_reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY show_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(reservation_id) as total_reservations FROM theater_reservations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reservations > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE seat_number BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_id FROM customers JOIN reservations ON customers.customer_id = reservations.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN reservations ON customers.customer_id = reservations.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(reservation_id) AS reservation_count FROM reservations GROUP BY customer_id HAVING reservation_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT show_name, show_id FROM shows WHERE show_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE customer_id = 3 AND show_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE show_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, show_name FROM customers INNER JOIN reservations ON customers.customer_id = reservations.customer_id INNER JOIN shows ON reservations.show_id = shows.show_id;
SELECT * FROM show;
SELECT show_id, show_name FROM show WHERE show_date = '2023-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT seat_id, seat_number, seat_status FROM seat WHERE seat_status = 'available';
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date FROM reservation ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM show;
SELECT show_name, show_date FROM show WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customer WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT reservation_id, show.show_name, seat.seat_number, reservation_date FROM reservation JOIN show ON reservation.show_id = show.show_id JOIN seat ON reservation.seat_id = seat.seat_id;

SELECT customer_name, show_name, reservation_date FROM customer JOIN reservation ON customer.customer_id = reservation.customer_id JOIN show ON reservation.show_id = show.show_id WHERE reservation_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM show;
SELECT show_name, show_time FROM show ORDER BY show_time DESC;
SELECT seat_id, seat_number, seat_status FROM seat WHERE seat_status = 'available';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT reservation_id, show_id, seat_id, customer_id FROM reservation LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM show;
SELECT show_name, show_time FROM show ORDER BY show_time DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT s.show_name, s.show_time, r.reservation_time, c.customer_name FROM show s JOIN reservation r ON s.show_id = r.show_id JOIN customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT s.show_name, st.seat_number, st.seat_status FROM show s JOIN show_seat ss ON s.show_id = ss.show_id JOIN seat st ON ss.seat_id = st.seat_id ORDER BY st.seat_number ASC;
